data.title: Inside I’m A Celeb’s Jamie Lynn Spears’ relationship with criminal ex Casey Aldridge including burglaries and gun drama
data.meta_description: JAMIE Lynn Spears is currently battling bugs in the I'm A Celebrity jungle - yet she's had just as tough a time on home turf.The Zoey 102 actress' bad
data.text:
JAMIE Lynn Spears is currently battling bugs in the I'm A Celebrity jungle - yet she's had just as tough a time on home turf.

The Zoey 102 actress' bad blood with sister Britney is well-documented, though there's a darker past with her criminal ex, too.

Singer and actress Jamie Lynn is the mother of two daughters and she announced her first pregnancy in December 2007.

At the time, she was with Mississipi man Casey Aldridge, and the pair confirmed that they were expecting a child together when Jamie Lynn was 16 and Casey was 18.

The pair became engaged in March 2008 shortly before welcoming their daughter Maddie Briann Aldridge on June 19, 2008.

Yet despite setting up a happy family unit, they split shortly after.

Jamie Lynn previously told how her reputation went from "child star to s**t" overnight when news of her baby with Casey broke.

Crying to First Dates’ Fred Siriex on I’m A Celebrity earlier this week, Jamie Lynn, now 32, said: “They didn’t want me to have the baby. A lot of people around me.”

In her 2022 memoir Things I Should Have Said, Jamie Lynn claimed her parents even tried to convince her to get an abortion, telling her a baby would wreck her work.

Since her break-up with Casey, Jamie Lynn has gone on to have a second daughter.

She shares Ivey Joan Watson - born in 2018 - with husband Jamie Watson, who she met in 2010.

Yet her ex Casey's life has taken a downward spiral.

Since their split, he has been arrested for burglary as well as for drug possession.

Back in 2020, TMZ reported how Casey broke into a campsite with the intention of stealing rifles.

He was charged with the felony of burglary breaking and entering a commercial building after the publication claimed he "tried stealing two rifles."

Meanwhile, in 2019, he was arrested for drug possession.

At the time, police claimed he had been found passed out behind the wheel of his car.

A report obtained by US Weekly at the time confirmed he was in the "driver's seat" and found "with the vehicle still in drive."

The publication reported he was arrested for possession of oxycodone, Xanax, lorazepam and drug paraphernalia.

He was taken to jail but released four days later.

At the time, he appear intent on changing his ways.

He told the publication: "I’m going to do everything in my power to better myself and not have to go through situations like this and make sure it never happens again.

"Whatever I need to do to do that — to not let it happen again."

He told of his fears of the arrest affecting his custody arrangement for his daughter with Jamie Lynn.

Prior to this, in 2016, Radar Online told how Casey was arrested back in May 2016 for driving under the influence, possession of paraphernalia and reckless driving.

He was found guilty and sentenced to 12 months of probation.

Earlier this month, Jamie Lynn entered the jungle alongside fellow stars like Made In Chelsea's Sam Thompson, former EastEnders actress Danielle Harold, and YouTuber Nella Rose.

She has threatened to quit the camp during her short stay Down Under - stating she is missing her kids.

Meanwhile, The Sun exclusively reported how Britney is watching Jamie's antics in camp.
